ccre.net

Interface ClientSocket


  • public interface ClientSocket
    An open data transfer socket.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this socket.
      java.io.DataInputStream openDataInputStream()
      Open a DataInputStream that reads from this socket.
      java.io.DataOutputStream openDataOutputStream()
      Open a DataOutputStream that writes to this socket.
      java.io.InputStream openInputStream()
      Open an InputStream that reads from this socket.
      java.io.OutputStream openOutputStream()
      Open an OutputStream that writes to this socket.
      boolean setSocketTimeout(int millis)
      Set the blocking operation timeout on this socket in milliseconds to wait, or zero to wait forever.

    • Method Detail

      • setSocketTimeout

        boolean setSocketTimeout(int millis)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Set the blocking operation timeout on this socket in milliseconds to wait, or zero to wait forever.
        Parameters:
        millis - how long to wait before throwing an IOException.
        Returns:
        if the timeout has been set.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • close

           throws java.io.IOException
